description.zh-cn: 中国计算机软件专家，中国共产党党员，现任中华人民共和国教育部部长、党组书记。曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记、中共天津市委副书记、北京航空航天大学校长等职。为中国共产党第十九、二十届中央委员，中国科学院院士。
description.en: A Chinese computer software expert and a member of the Communist Party of China, currently serving as the Minister of Education and Party Group Secretary of the People's Republic of China. He previously served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology, Deputy Secretary of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPC, and President of Beihang University. He is a member of the 19th and 20th Central Committees of the Communist Party of China and an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏自2021年8月20日起担任中华人民共和国教育部部长，并于同年8月1日开始担任该部党组书记。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng has served as the Minister of Education of the People's Republic of China since August 20, 2021, and began serving as the Secretary of the Ministry's Party Leadership Group on August 1 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏接替陈宝生担任中华人民共和国教育部部长。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng succeeded Chen Baosheng as the Minister of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏在李克强担任国务院总理期间被任命为教育部部长。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng was appointed Minister of Education during Li Keqiang's tenure as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在李强担任国务院总理期间，怀进鹏继续担任教育部部长。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng continued to serve as Minister of Education during Li Qiang's tenure as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏接替尚勇担任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng succeeded Shang Yong as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 张玉卓接替怀进鹏担任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Zhang Yuzhuo succeeded Huai Jinpeng as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏担任中国科学技术协会党组书记期间，万钢担任会长。
description.en: While Huai Jinpeng served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology, Wan Gang was its President.

relationships.target: 中国共产党天津市委员会

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏在李鸿忠担任中共天津市委书记期间任专职副书记。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng served as the full-time Deputy Secretary while Li Hongzhong was the Secretary of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏接替王东峰担任中共天津市委专职副书记。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng succeeded Wang Dongfeng as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 阴和俊接替怀进鹏担任中共天津市委专职副书记。
description.en: Yin Hejun succeeded Huai Jinpeng as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏接替李未担任北京航空航天大学校长。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng succeeded Li Wei as the President of Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 徐惠彬接替怀进鹏担任北京航空航天大学校长。
description.en: Xu Huibin succeeded Huai Jinpeng as the President of Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 怀进鹏出生于黑龙江省哈尔滨市。
description.en: Huai Jinpeng was born in Harbin, Heilongjiang Province.

degree.en: Master's degree from the Department of Computer Science

degree.zh-cn: 计算机软件专业工学博士学位
degree.en: Doctor of Engineering in Computer Software

description.zh-cn: 于1986年1月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in January 1986.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

position.en: Vice Minister, Member of the Party Leadership Group

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 经第十三届全国人大常委会第三十次会议表决，任命怀进鹏为教育部部长。
description.en: Following a vote at the 30th session of the Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress, Huai Jinpeng was appointed as the Minister of Education.
